---

## âœ… Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass locally (`npm run test`)
- [ ] Code follows framework patterns (role-based locators, `safeClick()`, etc.)
- [ ] Page objects extend `BasePage`
- [ ] Tests use `test.step()` for clarity
- [ ] Tests are tagged appropriately (`@smoke`, `@critical`, etc.)
- [ ] No hardcoded test data (use `UserFactory`)
- [ ] ESLint passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
